00062 int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00063 {       
00064     t_class *c;
00065     
00066     c = class_new("OMax.data", (method)OMax_data_new, (method)OMax_data_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_data), 
00067                   0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00068     
00069     // assistance
00070     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00071     
00072     // input methods
00073     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_size, "size", 0);
00074     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_init, "init", 0);
00075     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_reset, "reset", 0);
00076     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_type, "type", 0);
00077     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_write, "write", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00078     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_read, "read", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00079     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_add, "add", A_GIMME, 0);
00080     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_note, "note", A_GIMME, 0);
00081     
00082     //class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_setID, "in1", A_LONG, 0);
00083     //class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_setDuration, "in2", A_LONG, 0);
00084     //class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_setSection, "in3", A_LONG, 0);
00085     //class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_setPhrase, "in4", A_LONG, 0);
00086     
00087     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_setID, "int", A_LONG, 0);
00088     class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_list, "list", A_GIMME, 0);
00089     
00090     class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00091     OMax_data_class = c;
00092     
00093     return 0;
00094 }

00101 void *OMax_data_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00102 {
00103     t_OMax_data *x = NULL;
00104     
00105     if ((x = (t_OMax_data *)object_alloc(OMax_data_class)))
00106     {
00107         // List for extras
00108         x->inExtras = new list<float>();
00109         
00110         // Proxies (< Inlets included)
00111         x->proxy4 = proxy_new((t_object *)x, 4, &x->proxinlet);
00112         x->proxy3 = proxy_new((t_object *)x, 3, &x->proxinlet);
00113         x->proxy2 = proxy_new((t_object *)x, 2, &x->proxinlet);
00114         x->proxy1 = proxy_new((t_object *)x, 1, &x->proxinlet);
00115         
00116         // inlets
00117         //x->inPhrase = inlet_new(x, "list");
00118         //x->inSection = inlet_new(x,"list");
00119         //x->inDuration = inlet_new(x,"list");
00120         //x->inID = intin(x,1);
00121             
00122         // outlets
00123         x->out0 = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00124         
00125         if (argc == 0)
00126             object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing arguments");
00127         else
00128         {
00129             if (argv->a_type!= A_SYM)
00130                 object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of the data)");
00131             else
00132             {
00134                 
00135                 // get oracle name
00136                 x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00137                 
00138                 // set data name
00139                 x->dataname = OMax_data_name(x->oname);
00140                 if (x->dataname->s_thing!=NULL)
00141                     object_error((t_object*)x, "Name %s already used",x->oname->s_name);
00142                 else
00143                 {
00144                     x->dataname->s_thing = (t_object*)x;
00145                     x->nbcoeffs = 0;
00146                     
00148                     x->datatype = LETTERS;
00149                     string datatype = "LETTERS";
00150                     if (argc < 2 || (argv+1)->a_type!=A_SYM)
00151                         object_post((t_object *)x,"No data type, using LETTERS");
00152                     else
00153                     {
00154                         if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("PITCH"))
00155                         {
00156                             x->datatype = PITCH;
00157                             datatype = "PITCH";
00158                         }
00159                         else { 
00160                             if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("SPECTRAL"))
00161                             {
00162                                 x->datatype = SPECTRAL;
00163                                 datatype = "SPECTRAL";
00164                                 if (atom_getlong(argv+2))
00165                                     x->nbcoeffs = atom_getlong(argv+2);
00166                                 else
00167                                 {
00168                                     x->nbcoeffs = 7;
00169                                     object_post((t_object *)x, "Missing number of coefficients for %s, assuming 7",x->oname->s_name);
00170                                 }
00171                             }
00172                             else {
00173                                 if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("MIDI"))
00174                                 {
00175                                     x->datatype = MIDI;
00176                                     datatype = "MIDI";
00178                                     x->maxnotes = MAX_NOTES;
00179                                     x->notecount = 0;
00180                                     x->notes = (O_MIDI_note*)malloc(x->maxnotes*sizeof(O_MIDI_note));
00181                                 }
00182                                 else { 
00183                                     if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("LETTERS"));
00184                                     else
00185                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Type %s undefined, using LETTERS",atom_getsym(argv+1)->s_name);
00186                                 }
00187                             }
00188                         }
00189                     }
00190                     if (datatype == "SPECTRAL")
00191                         object_post((t_object *)x,"Data %s of type %s declared with %ld coefficients",x->oname->s_name, datatype.c_str(),x->nbcoeffs);
00192                     else
00193                         object_post((t_object *)x,"Data %s of type %s declared",x->oname->s_name, datatype.c_str());
00194                     
00195                 }
00196             }
00197         }
00198         // write flags
00199         x->wflag = 0;
00200         x->readcount = 0;
00201         x->noDelete = FALSE;
00202         
00203         // color
00204         t_object *box;
00205         t_jrgba colorvals;
00206         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00207         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00208         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00209     }
00210     return (x);
00211 }
00212 
00215 void OMax_data_free(t_OMax_data *x)
00216 {
00217     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00219     if (!(x->noDelete))
00220     {
00221         switch (x->datatype)
00222         {
00223             case SPECTRAL:
00224                 x->data.freestates<O_spectral>();
00225                 break;
00226             case PITCH:
00227                 x->data.freestates<O_pitch>();
00228                 break;
00229             case MIDI:
00230                 x->data.freestates<O_MIDI>();
00231                 break;
00232             default:
00233                 x->data.freestates<O_char>();
00234         }
00235     }
00236     
00237     if (x->dataname && x->dataname->s_thing == (t_object *)x)
00238         x->dataname->s_thing = NULL;
00239     
00240     // Proxies
00241     freeobject((t_object *)x->proxy1);
00242     freeobject((t_object *)x->proxy2);
00243     freeobject((t_object *)x->proxy3);
00244     freeobject((t_object *)x->proxy4);
00245 }
00246 
00250 void OMax_data_assist(t_OMax_data *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00251 {
00252     switch (io)
00253     {
00254         case 1: // inlets
00255             switch (index)
00256         {
00257             case 0: // leftmost
00258                 sprintf(s, "messages (init, reset, size, type, write, read, add, note)");
00259                 break;
00260             case 1:
00261                 sprintf(s, "ID (bufferef) & Duration of the next data");
00262                 break;
00263             case 2:
00264                 sprintf(s, "Section & Phrase # of next data");
00265                 break;
00266             case 3:
00267                 sprintf(s, "[f,f,i,i] Beat info of next data");
00268                 break;
00269             case 4:
00270                 sprintf(s, "Additional data of next data (float list)");
00271                 break;
00272         }
00273             break;
00274         case 2: // outlets
00275             switch (index)
00276         {
00277             case 0:
00278                 sprintf(s, "Anything you asked");
00279                 break;
00280         }
00281             break;
00282     }
00283 }

00293 void OMax_data_size(t_OMax_data *x)
00294 {
00295     outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size());
00296 }
00297 
00301 void OMax_data_init(t_OMax_data *x)
00302 {
00303     switch (x->datatype)
00304     {
00305         case SPECTRAL:
00306             x->data.start<O_spectral>();
00307             break;
00308         case PITCH:
00309             x->data.start<O_pitch>();
00310             break;
00311         case MIDI:
00312             x->data.start<O_MIDI>();
00313             break;
00314         default:
00315             x->data.start<O_char>();
00316     }
00317 }
00318 
00322 void OMax_data_reset(t_OMax_data *x)
00323 {
00324     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00326     if (x->noDelete)
00327     {
00328         x->data.clear_vect();
00329     }
00330     else
00331     {
00332         switch (x->datatype)
00333         {
00334             case SPECTRAL:
00335                 x->data.freestates<O_spectral>();
00336                 break;
00337             case PITCH:
00338                 x->data.freestates<O_pitch>();
00339                 break;
00340             case MIDI:
00341                 x->data.freestates<O_MIDI>();
00342                 break;
00343             default:
00344                 x->data.freestates<O_char>();
00345         }
00346     }
00347     x->data.reset_D2S();
00348     x->data.reset_S2D();
00349     ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00350     outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size());
00351 }
00352 
00356 void OMax_data_type(t_OMax_data *x)
00357 {
00358     outlet_int(x->out0, (long)x->datatype);
00359 }
00360 
00364 void OMax_data_write(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
00365 {
00366     if (x->data.get_size())
00367         defer_low(x, (method)OMax_data_dowrite, s, 0, NULL);
00368     else
00369         object_post((t_object*)x, "Data of oracle %s empty",x->oname->s_name);
00370 }
00371 
00375 void OMax_data_read(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
00376 {
00377     defer(x, (method)OMax_data_doread, s, 0, NULL);
00378     outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size()-1);
00379 }

00381 
00385 void OMax_data_add(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom * av)
00386 {
00387     int out;                            
00388     if (ac>0)
00389     {
00391         switch (x->datatype)
00392         {
00393             case LETTERS:
00394             {
00395                 bool valid = TRUE;
00396                 if (av->a_type == A_SYM)
00397                 {
00398                     O_char* newdata = new O_char(atom_getsym(av)->s_name[0]);
00399                     valid = OMax_data_setCommon(x, (O_label*)newdata);
00400                     if (valid)
00401                     {
00402                         ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00403                         if (!x->readcount)
00404                         {
00406                             out = x->data.add<O_char>(x->ID,(O_label*)(newdata));
00407                         }
00408                         else
00409                             object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d)",x->oname->s_name, x->readcount);
00410                         ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00411                         x->ID = 0;
00412                     }
00413                 }
00414                 else
00415                     object_error((t_object *)x,"Wrong type of data");
00416                 break;
00417                 
00418             }
00419             case PITCH:
00420             {
00421                 O_pitch * newdata = new O_pitch();
00422                 bool valid = TRUE;
00423                 switch(ac)
00424                 {
00425                     case 2:
00426                         if ((av+1)->a_type == A_LONG)
00427                             newdata->set_velocity(atom_getlong(av+1));
00428                         else
00429                         {
00430                             object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, velocity must be int");
00431                             valid = FALSE;
00432                             break;
00433                         }
00434                     case 1:
00435                         if (av->a_type == A_LONG)
00436                             newdata->set_pitch(atom_getlong(av));
00437                         else
00438                         {
00439                             object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, pitch must be int");
00440                             valid = FALSE;
00441                         }
00442                         break;
00443                     default:
00444                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, too many arguments");
00445                         valid = FALSE;
00446                         break;
00447                 }
00448                 valid = valid && OMax_data_setCommon(x, (O_label*)newdata);
00449                 if (valid)
00450                 {
00451                     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00452                     if (!x->readcount)
00453                     {
00454                         // Add state to data structure
00455                         out = x->data.add<O_pitch>(x->ID,(O_label*)newdata);
00456                     }
00457                     else
00458                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d)",x->oname->s_name, x->readcount);
00459                     ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00460                     x->ID = 0;
00461                 }
00462                 break;
00463             }
00464             case SPECTRAL:
00465             {
00466                 int pitchin = 0;
00467                 int coeffcount;
00468                 bool valid = TRUE;
00469                 O_spectral * newdata = new O_spectral();
00470                 if(ac < (x->nbcoeffs+1)) {
00471                     object_error((t_object *)x, "Missing coefficients");
00472                     valid = FALSE;
00473                 }
00474                 else
00475                 {
00476                     if ((av)->a_type == A_LONG)
00477                         pitchin = atom_getlong(av);
00478                     else
00479                         valid = FALSE;
00480                     list<float> coeffsin;
00481                     for (coeffcount = 0; coeffcount < x->nbcoeffs; coeffcount++)
00482                     {
00483                         if((av+coeffcount+1)->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00484                             coeffsin.push_back(atom_getfloat(av+coeffcount+1));
00485                         else {
00486                             object_error((t_object *)x, "Wrong types in coefficents");
00487                             valid = FALSE;
00488                         }
00489                     }
00490                     newdata = new O_spectral(pitchin, coeffsin);
00491                 }
00492                 valid = valid && OMax_data_setCommon(x, (O_label*)newdata);
00493                 if (valid)
00494                 {
00495                     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00496                     if (!x->readcount)
00497                     {
00498                         // Add state to data structure
00499                         out = x->data.add<O_spectral>(x->ID,(O_label*)newdata);
00500                     }
00501                     else
00502                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d)",x->oname->s_name, x->readcount);
00503                     ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00504                     x->ID = 0;
00505                 }
00506                 break;
00507             }
00508             case MIDI:
00509             {
00510                 bool valid = TRUE;
00511                 O_MIDI * newdata = new O_MIDI();
00512                 switch (ac)
00513                 {
00514                     case 2:
00515                         if ((av+1)->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00516                             newdata->set_mvelocity(atom_getfloat(av+1));
00517                         else
00518                         {
00519                             object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, mean velocity must be float");
00520                             valid = FALSE;
00521                             break;
00522                         }
00523                     case 1:
00524                         if (av->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00525                             newdata->set_vpitch(atom_getfloat(av));
00526                         else
00527                         {
00528                             object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, virtual pitch must be float");
00529                             valid = FALSE;
00530                         }
00531                         break;
00532                     default:
00533                         object_error((t_object *)x, "Error in input, too many arguments");
00534                         valid = FALSE;
00535                         break;
00536                 }
00537                 // set common data hold in the structure
00538                 valid = valid && OMax_data_setCommon(x, (O_label*)newdata);
00539                 if (valid)
00540                 {
00541                     // Add accumulated notes to the frame
00542                     int i;
00543                     list<O_MIDI_note> notes;
00544                     for (i=0;i<x->notecount;i++)
00545                         notes.push_back(x->notes[i]);
00546                     newdata->set_notes(notes);
00547                     
00548                     ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00549                     if (!x->readcount)
00550                     {
00551                         // Add state to data structure
00552                         out = x->data.add<O_MIDI>(atom_getlong(av+4),(O_label*)newdata);
00553                     }
00554                     else
00555                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Oracle %s being read (%d)",x->oname->s_name, x->readcount);
00556                     ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00557                     
00558                     // reset ID
00559                     x->ID= 0;
00560                     // Clear accumulated notes
00561                     x->notecount = 0;
00562                 }
00563                 break;
00564             }
00565         }
00567         outlet_int(x->out0, (long)x->data.get_size());
00568     }
00569     else
00570         object_error((t_object *)x,"Error in input, too few arguments");
00571 }
00572 
00576 void OMax_data_note(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom * av)
00577 {
00578     long count = (long)ac;
00579     t_atom_long vals[5];
00580     if (x->datatype!=MIDI)
00581         object_error((t_object*)x, "No note stacking allowed in this type");
00582     else
00583     {
00584         if (!atom_getlong_array((long)ac, av, count, vals))
00585         {
00586             switch (count) {
00587                 case 2:
00588                     x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1]);
00589                     x->notecount++;
00590                     break;
00591                 case 3:
00592                     x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2]);
00593                     x->notecount++;
00594                     break;
00595                 case 4:
00596                     x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2],vals[3]);
00597                     x->notecount++;
00598                     break;
00599                 case 5:
00600                     x->notes[x->notecount] = O_MIDI_note(vals[0],vals[1],vals[2],vals[3],vals[4]);
00601                     x->notecount++;
00602                     break;
00603                 default:
00604                     object_error((t_object*)x, "Wrong number of argument for a note");
00605                     break;
00606             }
00607         }
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 void OMax_data_setID(t_OMax_data *x, long n)
00612 {
00613     if(proxy_getinlet((t_object*)x)==1)
00614         x->ID = n;
00615     else
00616         object_error((t_object*)x, "OMax.data doesn't understand \"int\" except ID in the second inlet");
00617     //x->Duration = m;
00618 }

00635 void OMax_data_list(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00636 {
00637     //object_post((t_object *)x, "list receive in inlet %ld", proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x));
00638     switch(proxy_getinlet((t_object*)x))
00639     {
00640         case 4:
00641         {
00642             int l;
00643             x->inExtras->clear();
00644             for (l=0;l<argc;l++)
00645             {
00646                 if (atom_gettype(argv+l)==A_FLOAT)
00647                     x->inExtras->push_back(atom_getfloat(argv+l));
00648                 else
00649                     object_error((t_object *)x,"Extras must be a list of floats");
00650             }
00651             break;
00652         }
00653         case 3:
00654         {
00655             if (argc==4 && (atom_gettype(argv)==A_FLOAT) && (atom_gettype(argv+1)==A_FLOAT) && (atom_gettype(argv+2)==A_LONG) && (atom_gettype(argv+3)==A_LONG))
00656             {
00657                 x->inBeatF[0] = atom_getfloat(argv);
00658                 x->inBeatF[1] = atom_getfloat(argv+1);
00659                 x->inBeatI[0] = atom_getlong(argv+2);
00660                 x->inBeatI[1] = atom_getlong(argv+3);
00661             }
00662             else
00663                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Beat info must be 2 floats & 2 ints");
00664             break;
00665         }
00666         case 2:
00667         {
00668             if (argc==2 && (atom_gettype(argv)==A_LONG) && (atom_gettype(argv+1)==A_LONG))
00669             {
00670                 x->Section = atom_getlong(argv);
00671                 x->Phrase = atom_getlong(argv+1);
00672             }
00673             else
00674                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Section & Phrase # must be a pair of int");
00675             break;
00676         }
00677         case 1:
00678         {
00679             if (argc==2 && (atom_gettype(argv)==A_LONG) && (atom_gettype(argv+1)==A_LONG))
00680             {
00681                 x->ID = atom_getlong(argv);
00682                 x->Duration = atom_getlong(argv+1);
00683             }
00684             else
00685                 object_error((t_object *)x,"ID & Duration must be a pair of int");
00686             break;
00687         }
00688         case 0:
00689             ;
00690         default:
00691             object_post((t_object *)x, "list receive in inlet %ld", proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x));
00692     }
00693     
00694 }
00695 
00697 
00699 
00700 
00703 t_symbol * OMax_data_name(t_symbol * oname)
00704 {
00705     char dataname[128];
00706     strcpy(dataname,oname->s_name);
00708     strcat(dataname,"_data");
00709     return gensym(dataname);
00710 }
00711 
00714 bool OMax_data_setCommon(t_OMax_data *x, O_label* newdata)
00715 {
00716     if (x->ID!=0)
00717         newdata->set_bufferef(x->ID);
00718     else
00719     {
00720         object_error((t_object*)x, "Missing ID (bufferref)");
00721         return FALSE;
00722     }
00723     newdata->set_duration(x->Duration);
00724     newdata->set_section(x->Section);
00725     newdata->set_phrase(x->Phrase);
00726     newdata->set_tempo(x->inBeatF[0]);
00727     newdata->set_phase(x->inBeatF[1]);
00728     newdata->set_binfo1(x->inBeatI[0]);
00729     newdata->set_binfo2(x->inBeatI[1]);
00730     newdata->set_extras(*x->inExtras);
00731     return TRUE;
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00738 void OMax_data_dowrite(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom* argv)
00739 {
00740     short err = 0;
00741     t_fourcc filetype = 'TEXT';
00742     t_fourcc outtype = 'TEXT';
00743     short path, newpath = 0;
00744     short numtypes = 1;
00745     char* foldername = NULL;
00746     char temp[256];
00747     char fullpath[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00748     char filename[MAX_FILENAME_CHARS];
00749     
00750     if (s == gensym(""))
00751     {      // if no argument supplied, ask for file
00752         if (saveasdialog_extended(filename, &newpath, &outtype, &filetype, numtypes))     // non-zero: user cancelled
00753             return;
00754     }
00755     else
00756     {
00757         strcpy(fullpath, s->s_name);
00758         path_frompotentialpathname(fullpath, &path, filename);
00759         foldername = strrchr(fullpath, '/');
00760         if (foldername)
00761         {
00762             *foldername = 0;
00763             foldername = strrchr(fullpath, '/');
00764             if (foldername)
00765             {
00766                 *foldername = 0;
00767                 foldername++;
00768                 err = path_frompathname(fullpath, &path, temp);
00769                 if (!err)
00770                     err = path_createfolder(path, foldername, &newpath);
00771                 if (err)
00772                     object_error((t_object*)x, "error creating folder", err);
00773             }
00774             else
00775                 path_frompathname(fullpath, &newpath, temp);
00776         }
00777         else
00778         {
00779             newpath = path_getdefault();
00780             strcpy(filename, s->s_name);
00781         }
00782     }
00783     OMax_data_writefile(x, filename, newpath);
00784 }
00785 
00789 void OMax_data_writefile(t_OMax_data *x, char *filename, short path)
00790 {
00791     char err;
00792     int* note_data = NULL;
00793     float* sp_data = NULL;
00794     int extras_nb = 0;
00795     float* extras_data = (float*)malloc(MAX_EXTRAS*sizeof(float));
00796     long i = 0;
00797     long idx = 0;
00798     long nbstates = x->data.get_size();
00799     
00800     char letter[2]; letter[1] = NULL;
00801     
00802     O_label* current;
00803     
00804     t_symbol* sym_state = gensym("state");
00805     t_symbol* sym_time = gensym("time");
00806     t_symbol* sym_seg = gensym("seg");
00807     t_symbol* sym_letter = gensym("letter");
00808     t_symbol* sym_note = gensym("note");
00809     t_symbol* sym_pitch = gensym("pitch");
00810     t_symbol* sym_coeffs = gensym("coeffs");
00811     t_symbol* sym_slice = gensym("slice");
00812     t_symbol* sym_notes = gensym("notes");
00813     t_symbol* sym_beat = gensym("beat");
00814     t_symbol* sym_extras = gensym("extras");
00815     
00816     t_atom* datab = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(nbstates*sizeof(t_atom));
00817     t_atom* array = NULL;
00818     /*if (x->nbcoeffs>2)
00819      atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &array, &err);
00820      else
00821      atom_alloc_array(3, &i, &array, &err);*/
00822     
00823     t_dictionary* d;
00824     t_dictionary* ditem;
00825     
00826     d = dictionary_new(); //main directory
00827     
00828     // name
00829     dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("name"), x->oname);
00830     
00831     switch (x->datatype)
00832     {
00833         case MIDI:
00834         {
00835             // vars & alloc
00836             t_dictionary* notedic;
00837             atom_alloc_array(MAX_EXTRAS, &i, &array, &err);
00838             t_atom* notesarray = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(MAX_NOTES*sizeof(t_atom));
00839             
00840             dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("MIDI"));
00841             for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00842             {
00843                 current = x->data[idx];
00844                 ditem = dictionary_new();
00845                 // state number
00846                 dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00847                 // time data (buffer date and duration)
00848                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00849                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00850                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00851                 // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00852                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00853                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00854                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00855                 // beat data
00856                 atom_setfloat(array, current->get_tempo());
00857                 atom_setfloat(array+1, current->get_phase());
00858                 atom_setlong(array+2, current->get_binfo1());
00859                 atom_setlong(array+3, current->get_binfo2());
00860                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_beat, 4, array);
00861                 // extras data
00862                 extras_nb = current->get_extras().size();
00863                 extras_data = current->get_extras(extras_data);
00864                 atom_setfloat_array(extras_nb, array, extras_nb, extras_data);
00865                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_extras, extras_nb, array);
00866                 // slice data
00867                 atom_setfloat(array, ((O_MIDI*)current)->get_vpitch());
00868                 atom_setfloat(array+1, ((O_MIDI*)current)->get_mvelocity());
00869                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_slice, 2, array);
00870                 // notes
00871                 list<O_MIDI_note> notes = ((O_MIDI*)current)->get_notes();
00872                 list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator notit;
00873                 i = 0;
00874                 for (notit = notes.begin(); notit != notes.end() ; notit++)
00875                 {
00876                     notedic = dictionary_new();
00877                     note_data = notit->get_note(note_data);
00878                     atom_setlong_array(5, array, 5, (t_atom_long*)note_data);
00879                     dictionary_appendatoms(notedic, sym_note, 3, array);
00880                     dictionary_appendatoms(notedic, sym_time, 2, array+3);
00881                     atom_setobj(&notesarray[i++], notedic);
00882                 }
00883                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_notes, i, notesarray);
00884                 // add to the data array
00885                 atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00886             }
00887             break;
00888         }
00889         case SPECTRAL:
00890         {
00891             // vars & alloc
00892             atom_alloc_array((x->nbcoeffs>MAX_EXTRAS?x->nbcoeffs:MAX_EXTRAS), &i, &array, &err);
00893             
00894             dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("SPECTRAL"));
00895             
00896             for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00897             {
00898                 current = x->data[idx];
00899                 ditem = dictionary_new();
00900                 // state number
00901                 dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00902                 // time data (buffer date and duration)
00903                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00904                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00905                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00906                 // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00907                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00908                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00909                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00910                 // beat data
00911                 atom_setfloat(array, current->get_tempo());
00912                 atom_setfloat(array+1, current->get_phase());
00913                 atom_setlong(array+2, current->get_binfo1());
00914                 atom_setlong(array+3, current->get_binfo2());
00915                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_beat, 4, array);
00916                 // extras data
00917                 extras_nb = current->get_extras().size();
00918                 extras_data = current->get_extras(extras_data);
00919                 atom_setfloat_array(extras_nb, array, extras_nb, extras_data);
00920                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_extras, extras_nb, array);
00921                 // pitch
00922                 dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_pitch, ((O_spectral*)current)->get_pitch());
00923                 // MFCCs
00924                 sp_data = (float*)calloc(x->nbcoeffs, sizeof(float));
00925                 sp_data = ((O_spectral*)current)->get_coeffs(sp_data);
00926                 atom_setfloat_array(x->nbcoeffs, array, x->nbcoeffs, sp_data);
00927                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_coeffs, x->nbcoeffs, array);
00928                 // add to the data array
00929                 atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00930             }
00931             break;
00932         }
00933         case PITCH:
00934         {
00935             // alloc
00936             atom_alloc_array(MAX_EXTRAS, &i, &array, &err);
00937             
00938             dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("PITCH"));
00939             
00940             for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00941             {
00942                 current = x->data[idx];
00943                 ditem = dictionary_new();
00944                 // state number
00945                 dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00946                 // time data (buffer date and duration)
00947                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00948                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00949                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00950                 // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00951                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00952                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00953                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00954                 // beat data
00955                 atom_setfloat(array, current->get_tempo());
00956                 atom_setfloat(array+1, current->get_phase());
00957                 atom_setlong(array+2, current->get_binfo1());
00958                 atom_setlong(array+3, current->get_binfo2());
00959                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_beat, 4, array);
00960                 // extras data
00961                 extras_nb = current->get_extras().size();
00962                 extras_data = current->get_extras(extras_data);
00963                 atom_setfloat_array(extras_nb, array, extras_nb, extras_data);
00964                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_extras, extras_nb, array);
00965                 // note
00966                 note_data = ((O_pitch*)current)->get_data(note_data);
00967                 atom_setlong_array(3, array, 3, (t_atom_long*)note_data);
00968                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_note, 3, array);
00969                 // add to the data array
00970                 atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00971             }
00972             break;
00973         }
00974         default:
00975         {
00976             // alloc
00977             atom_alloc_array(MAX_EXTRAS, &i, &array, &err);
00978             
00979             dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("LETTERS"));
00980             
00981             for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00982             {
00983                 current = x->data[idx];
00984                 ditem = dictionary_new();
00985                 // state number
00986                 dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00987                 // time data (buffer date and duration)
00988                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00989                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00990                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00991                 // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00992                 atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00993                 atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00994                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00995                 // beat data
00996                 atom_setfloat(array, current->get_tempo());
00997                 atom_setfloat(array+1, current->get_phase());
00998                 atom_setlong(array+2, current->get_binfo1());
00999                 atom_setlong(array+3, current->get_binfo2());
01000                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_beat, 4, array);
01001                 // extras data
01002                 extras_nb = current->get_extras().size();
01003                 extras_data = current->get_extras(extras_data);
01004                 atom_setfloat_array(extras_nb, array, extras_nb, extras_data);
01005                 dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_extras, extras_nb, array);
01006                 // letter
01007                 letter[0] = ((O_char*)current)->get_letter();
01008                 dictionary_appendsym(ditem, sym_letter, gensym(letter));
01009                 // add to the data array
01010                 atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
01011             }
01012             break;
01013         }
01014     }
01015     dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("type"), x->datatype);
01016     if (x->datatype == 2)
01017         dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("#coeffs"), x->nbcoeffs);
01018     dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("size"), nbstates);
01019     dictionary_appendatoms(d, gensym("data"), nbstates, datab);
01020     
01021     err = dictionary_write(d, filename, path);
01022     if (err)
01023         object_error((t_object*)x, "Error writing file");
01024     else 
01025         object_post((t_object*)x, "Written data of oracle %s in file %s", x->oname->s_name, filename);
01026     
01027     
01028     sysmem_freeptr(array);
01029     sysmem_freeptr(datab);
01030     free(note_data);
01031     free(sp_data);
01032     object_free(d);
01033 }
01034 
01035 void OMax_data_doread(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
01036 {
01037     char err;
01038     short path;
01039     int date = 0;
01040     t_atom_long size;
01041     t_atom_long datatype, nbcoeffs;
01042     long i, idx;
01043     char filename[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
01044     t_fourcc type = FOUR_CHAR_CODE('JSON');
01045     t_symbol *symdata = NULL;
01046     t_atom *data = NULL;
01047     t_dictionary *d = NULL;
01048     
01049     if (s == gensym(""))
01050     {
01051         if (open_dialog(filename, &path, &type, &type, 1))
01052             return;
01053     }
01054     else
01055     {
01056         strcpy(filename, s->s_name);
01057         if (locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &type, &type, 1))
01058         {
01059             object_error((t_object *)x, "can't find file %s", filename);
01060             return;
01061         }
01062     }
01063     
01064     dictionary_read(filename, path, &d);
01065     if (d)
01066     {
01067         dictionary_getsym(d, gensym("name"), &symdata);
01068         dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("type"), &datatype);
01069         if (datatype!=x->datatype)
01070         {
01071             object_error((t_object*)x, "data type mismatch");
01072             return;
01073         }
01074         
01075         if (x->datatype == 2 )
01076         {
01077             dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("#coeffs"), &nbcoeffs);
01078             if (nbcoeffs != x->nbcoeffs)
01079             {
01080                 x->nbcoeffs = nbcoeffs;
01081                 object_post((t_object*)x, "Number of coefficients changed");
01082                 object_post((t_object*)x,"New number : %d coefficients", x->nbcoeffs);
01083             }
01084         }
01085         
01086         OMax_data_reset(x);
01087         
01088         t_symbol* sym_state = gensym("state");
01089         t_symbol* sym_time = gensym("time");
01090         t_symbol* sym_seg = gensym("seg");
01091         t_symbol* sym_letter = gensym("letter");
01092         t_symbol* sym_note = gensym("note");
01093         t_symbol* sym_pitch = gensym("pitch");
01094         t_symbol* sym_coeffs = gensym("coeffs");
01095         t_symbol* sym_slice = gensym("slice");
01096         t_symbol* sym_notes = gensym("notes");
01097         t_symbol* sym_beat = gensym("beat");
01098         t_symbol* sym_extras = gensym("extras");
01099         
01100         
01101         dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("size"), &size);
01102         dictionary_getatoms(d, gensym("data"), (long int*)&size, &data);
01103         
01104         if (x->readcount==0 && x->wflag==0)
01105         {
01106             // vars
01107             int j;
01108             t_atom_long statenb;
01109             t_atom *array = NULL;
01110             t_dictionary *ditem = NULL;
01111             list<float> extras;
01112             
01113             // alloc
01114             atom_alloc_array(MAX_EXTRAS, &i, &array, &err);
01115             /*if (x->nbcoeffs>2)
01116              atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &array, &err);
01117              else
01118              atom_alloc_array(3, &i, &array, &err);*/
01119             
01120             ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
01121             switch (datatype)
01122             {
01123                 case 3: // MIDI
01124                     for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
01125                     {
01126                         long k,l;
01127                         O_MIDI* newstate;
01128                         t_atom* notes = NULL;
01129                         t_atom* notetime = NULL;
01130                         t_dictionary* notedic = NULL;
01131                         list<O_MIDI_note> notelist;
01132                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
01133                         if (ditem)
01134                         {
01135                             newstate = new O_MIDI();
01136                             
01137                             // get state number
01138                             dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
01139                             newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
01140                             
01141                             i = 0;
01142                             // get time data (buffer date & duration)
01143                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
01144                             if (i==2)
01145                             {
01146                                 date = atom_getlong(array);
01147                                 newstate->set_bufferef(date);
01148                                 newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
01149                             }
01150                             
01151                             i = 0;
01152                             // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
01153                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
01154                             if (i==2)
01155                             {
01156                                 newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
01157                                 newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
01158                             }
01159                             
01160                             i = 0;
01161                             // get beat data (tempo, phase, binfo1, binfo2)
01162                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_beat, &i, &array);
01163                             if (i==4)
01164                             {
01165                                 newstate->set_tempo(atom_getfloat(array));
01166                                 newstate->set_phase(atom_getfloat(array+1));
01167                                 newstate->set_binfo1(atom_getlong(array+2));
01168                                 newstate->set_binfo2(atom_getlong(array+3));
01169                             }
01170                             
01171                             i = 0;
01172                             // get extras data
01173                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_extras, &i, &array);
01174                             for (j=0;j<i;j++)
01175                                 extras.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
01176                             newstate->set_extras(extras);
01177                             extras.clear();
01178                             
01179                             i = 0;
01180                             // get slice data (virtual pitch & mean velocity)
01181                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_slice, &i, &array);
01182                             if (i==2)
01183                             {
01184                                 newstate->set_vpitch(atom_getfloat(array));
01185                                 newstate->set_mvelocity(atom_getfloat(array+1));
01186                             }
01187                             
01188                             i = 0;
01189                             // get notes
01190                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_notes, &i, &notes);
01191                             for (j=0; j<i; j++)
01192                             {
01193                                 notedic = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&notes[j]);
01194                                 dictionary_getatoms(notedic, sym_note, &k, &array);
01195                                 dictionary_getatoms(notedic, sym_time, &l, &notetime);
01196                                 if (k==3 && l==2)
01197                                 {
01198                                     O_MIDI_note newnote (atom_getlong(array), atom_getlong(array+1), atom_getlong(array+2), atom_getlong(notetime), atom_getlong(notetime+1));
01199                                     notelist.push_back(newnote);
01200                                 }
01201                                 
01202                             }
01203                             newstate->set_notes(notelist);
01204                             notelist.clear();
01205                             
01206                             // add to the data structure
01207                             x->data.add<O_MIDI>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
01208                         }
01209                     }
01210                     break;
01211                     
01212                 case 2: // Spectral
01213                     for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
01214                     {
01215                         t_atom_long pitch;
01216                         list<float> coeffs;
01217                         O_spectral* newstate;
01218                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
01219                         if (ditem)
01220                         {
01221                             newstate = new O_spectral();
01222                             
01223                             // get state number
01224                             dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
01225                             newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
01226                             
01227                             i = 0;
01228                             // get time data (buffer date & duration)
01229                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
01230                             if (i==2)
01231                             {
01232                                 date = atom_getlong(array);
01233                                 newstate->set_bufferef(date);
01234                                 newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
01235                             }
01236                             
01237                             i = 0;
01238                             // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
01239                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
01240                             if (i==2)
01241                             {
01242                                 newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
01243                                 newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
01244                             }
01245                             
01246                             i = 0;
01247                             // get beat data (tempo, phase, binfo1, binfo2)
01248                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_beat, &i, &array);
01249                             if (i==4)
01250                             {
01251                                 newstate->set_tempo(atom_getfloat(array));
01252                                 newstate->set_phase(atom_getfloat(array+1));
01253                                 newstate->set_binfo1(atom_getlong(array+2));
01254                                 newstate->set_binfo2(atom_getlong(array+3));
01255                             }
01256                             
01257                             i = 0;
01258                             // get extras data
01259                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_extras, &i, &array);
01260                             for (j=0;j<i;j++)
01261                                 extras.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
01262                             newstate->set_extras(extras);
01263                             extras.clear();
01264                             
01265                             // get pitch
01266                             dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_pitch, &pitch);
01267                             newstate->set_pitch(pitch);
01268                             
01269                             i = 0;
01270                             // get spectral coefficients
01271                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_coeffs, &i, &array);
01272                             if (i == x->nbcoeffs)
01273                             {
01274                                 for (j=0; j<x->nbcoeffs; j++)
01275                                     coeffs.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
01276                                 newstate->set_coeffs(coeffs);
01277                             }
01278                             
01279                             // add to the data structure
01280                             x->data.add<O_spectral>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
01281                         }
01282                     }
01283                     break;
01284                     
01285                 case 1: // pitch
01286                     for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
01287                     {
01288                         O_pitch* newstate;
01289                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
01290                         if (ditem)
01291                         {
01292                             newstate = new O_pitch();
01293                             
01294                             // get state number
01295                             dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
01296                             newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
01297                             
01298                             i=0;
01299                             // get time data (buffer date & duration)
01300                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
01301                             if (i==2)
01302                             {
01303                                 date = atom_getlong(array);
01304                                 newstate->set_bufferef(date);
01305                                 newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
01306                             }
01307                             
01308                             i = 0;
01309                             // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
01310                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
01311                             if (i==2)
01312                             {
01313                                 newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
01314                                 newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
01315                             }
01316                             
01317                             i = 0;
01318                             // get beat data (tempo, phase, binfo1, binfo2)
01319                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_beat, &i, &array);
01320                             if (i==4)
01321                             {
01322                                 newstate->set_tempo(atom_getfloat(array));
01323                                 newstate->set_phase(atom_getfloat(array+1));
01324                                 newstate->set_binfo1(atom_getlong(array+2));
01325                                 newstate->set_binfo2(atom_getlong(array+3));
01326                             }
01327                             
01328                             i = 0;
01329                             // get extras data
01330                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_extras, &i, &array);
01331                             for (j=0;j<i;j++)
01332                                 extras.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
01333                             newstate->set_extras(extras);
01334                             extras.clear();
01335                             
01336                             i=0;
01337                             // get note data (pitch, velocity, channel)
01338                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_note, &i, &array);
01339                             if (i==3)
01340                             {
01341                                 newstate->set_pitch(atom_getlong(array));
01342                                 newstate->set_velocity(atom_getlong(array+1));
01343                                 newstate->set_channel(atom_getlong(array+2));
01344                             }
01345                             
01346                             // add to the data structure
01347                             x->data.add<O_pitch>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
01348                         }
01349                     }
01350                     break;
01351                     
01352                 default: // Letters
01353                     for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
01354                     {
01355                         t_symbol* letter;
01356                         O_char* newstate;
01357                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
01358                         if (ditem)
01359                         {
01360                             // get letter and #state
01361                             dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
01362                             dictionary_getsym(ditem, sym_letter, &letter);
01363                             newstate = new O_char(letter->s_name[0]);
01364                             newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
01365                             
01366                             // get time data (buffer date & duration)
01367                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
01368                             if (i==2)
01369                             {
01370                                 date = atom_getlong(array);
01371                                 newstate->set_bufferef(date);
01372                                 newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
01373                             }
01374                             i = 0;
01375                             
01376                             // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
01377                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
01378                             if (i==2)
01379                             {
01380                                 newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
01381                                 newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
01382                             }
01383                             
01384                             i = 0;
01385                             // get beat data (tempo, phase, binfo1, binfo2)
01386                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_beat, &i, &array);
01387                             if (i==4)
01388                             {
01389                                 newstate->set_tempo(atom_getfloat(array));
01390                                 newstate->set_phase(atom_getfloat(array+1));
01391                                 newstate->set_binfo1(atom_getlong(array+2));
01392                                 newstate->set_binfo2(atom_getlong(array+3));
01393                             }
01394                             
01395                             i = 0;
01396                             // get extras data
01397                             dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_extras, &i, &array);
01398                             for (j=0;j<i;j++)
01399                                 extras.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
01400                             newstate->set_extras(extras);
01401                             extras.clear();
01402                             
01403                             // add to the data structure
01404                             x->data.add<O_char>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
01405                         }
01406                     }
01407                     break;
01408             }
01409             ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
01410         }
01411         object_free(d);
01412         object_post((t_object *)x, "Loaded data from oracle %s", symdata->s_name);
01413     }
01414 }
01415 
01417 
01418 }
